Property.Name: DerBankCode
Property.Expression: (select bank_code from posm_pay_type where posm_pay_type = PosmPayType)

Property.Name: DerBankType
Property.Expression: (select b.zla_bank_type from posm_pay_type_mst a join bank_hdr_mst b on b.bank_code = a.bank_code where a.posm_pay_type = PosmPayType)

Property.Name: DerDrwDescription
Property.Expression: ISNULL((SELECT TOP 1 description FROM zpv_drawer WHERE drawer = Drawer),'')

Property.Name: DerAmountTypeB
Property.Expression: isnull((select sum(dtr.amount) from zpv_drawer_trans dtr where dtr.zla_bank_type = 'B' and dtr.drawer = drawer),0)

Property.Name: DerAmountTypeE
Property.Expression: isnull((select sum(dtr.amount) from zpv_drawer_trans dtr where dtr.zla_bank_type = 'E' and dtr.drawer = drawer),0)

Property.Name: DerAmountTypeQ
Property.Expression: isnull((select sum(dtr.amount) from zpv_drawer_trans dtr where dtr.zla_bank_type = 'Q' and dtr.drawer = drawer),0)

Property.Name: DerAmountTypeR
Property.Expression: isnull((select sum(dtr.amount) from zpv_drawer_trans dtr where dtr.zla_bank_type = 'R' and dtr.drawer = drawer),0)

Property.Name: DerAmountTypeT
Property.Expression: isnull((select sum(dtr.amount) from zpv_drawer_trans dtr where dtr.zla_bank_type = 'T' and dtr.drawer = drawer),0)

Property.Name: DerDrawerBalance
Property.Expression: (select isnull(sum(drw.amount),0) from zpv_drawer_trans drw where drw.drawer = drawer)

Property.Name: DerEndUserTypeC
Property.Expression: (select ar_type_id from zla_ar_endtype_mst where end_user_type = EndUserType and type = 'C')

Property.Name: DerEndUserTypeD
Property.Expression: (select ar_type_id from zla_ar_endtype_mst where end_user_type = EndUserType and type = 'D')

Property.Name: DerEndUserTypeI
Property.Expression: (select ar_type_id from zla_ar_endtype_mst where end_user_type = EndUserType and type = 'I')

Property.Name: DerChequesCartera
Property.Expression: dbo.ZPV_CustomerCreditLimitInfoSp('C',CustNum)

Property.Name: DerCobradoNoEntregado
Property.Expression: dbo.ZPV_CustomerCreditLimitInfoSp('PN',CustNum)

Property.Name: DerDeudaTotal
Property.Expression: dbo.ZPV_CustomerCreditLimitInfoSp('T',CustNum)

Property.Name: DerFacturasAVencer
Property.Expression: dbo.ZPV_CustomerCreditLimitInfoSp('F',CustNum)

Property.Name: DerFacturasVencidas
Property.Expression: dbo.ZPV_CustomerCreditLimitInfoSp('D',CustNum)

Property.Name: DerPedidosAutorizados
Property.Expression: dbo.ZPV_CustomerCreditLimitInfoSp('PA',CustNum)

Property.Name: DerPedidosRetenidos
Property.Expression: dbo.ZPV_CustomerCreditLimitInfoSp('PR',CustNum)

Property.Name: DerTotalPedidos
Property.Expression: dbo.ZPV_CustomerCreditLimitInfoSp('PT',CustNum)

Property.Name: DerMaxDiscUser
Property.Expression: (select slc.zpv_disc_max from slsman_mst sls inner join slsclass_mst slc on slc.slsclass = sls.slsclass where sls.username = Username)

Property.Name: DerUserMaster
Property.Expression: (select isnull(slc.zpv_master,0) from slsman_mst sls inner join slsclass_mst slc on slc.slsclass = sls.slsclass where sls.username = Username)

Property.Name: ZpvSlsman
Property.Expression: isnull((select a.slsman from slsman_mst a where a.username = Username),'')
